latex:
Define $ n_a!$ for $ n$ and $ a$ positive to be\\
\\
\[ n_a ! = n (n-a)(n-2a)(n-3a)...(n-ka)\]\\
\\
where $ k$ is the greatest integer for which $ n>ka$.  Then the quotient $ 72_8!/18_2!$ is equal to\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 4^5 \qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 4^6 \qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 4^8 \qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 4^9 \qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 4^{12}$
